About Me

Hey! My name is Gabriel Halpern and I am a Software Developer. I am currently a junior at Elon University where I study Computer Science with a minor in Data Science.

Design

I have experience designing in Adobe Illustrator as well as some other Adobe Creative Cloud products.

Code

I am well-versed in Java and Python, and I have some experience working with MySQL and JavaScript.

Tools

I have used git for a number of projects. In fact, this website is hosted on Github Pages.

Featured Projects

Fractal Trees

  • JavaScript

This is a fractal tree generator I made as a project for one of my college courses. It allows you to create unique fractal trees by adjusting a variety of parameters. Feel free to check it out, but be warned: it's not the most efficient program I've ever written.
